title: Appeal after driver wreaks havoc on roads
text:
21 February 2017 at 12:20pm Appeal after driver wreaks havoc on roads 
Jersey Police are appealing for witnesses after a driver wreaked havoc on the roads, colliding with a car and speeding off with sparks coming from the front wheel. 
The trouble started just before 10pm on Saturday when a brown car was seen driving erratically along Le Mont Les Vaux in St Brelade. 
It then hit a car travelling in the opposite direction near Shell Gardens, before driving away with the wheel spinning. 
Other vehicles were forced to pull over and the driver was then seen near Woodbine Stores towards Silver Springs, with sparks and a loud noise coming from the driverâ€™s front wheel. 
Officers are now investigating offences of dangerous driving, hit and run and driving a vehicle in a dangerous condition. 
Anyone with information should contact police on 01534 612 612. Last updated Tue 21 Feb 2017
